titles.title: To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Dr. Martha Hughes Cannon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 5/27/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the United States Postal Service to issue a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Dr. Martha Hughes Cannon.
